li.label: Joywire
li.description: It feels amazing.

li.label: Strange feeling
li.description: I feel strange, but also very relaxed.

li.label: psychic soothe (medium)
li.description: It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.

li.label: psychic drone (low)
li.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.

li.label: psychic drone (medium)
li.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!

li.label: psychic drone (high)
li.description: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!

li.label: psychic drone (extreme)
li.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...

li.description: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.

li.label: someone was executed
li.description: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.

li.label: someone killed by organ harvest
li.description: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.

li.description: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
